topic.title: Beaker Browser
topic.body: It seems easier to create your own sites, apps in Beaker. But the infrastructure and community for ZeroNet seems better formed.   Thoughts?

1547686155_191jbK3GNmVritcMymKkFuxyYFXxq.body: since it's json , I would think the creator of the document would also be able to count at that time, and add an attribute called vehicle_count with the value.  OR, one could use an SP where you pass in the array length as the second argument.   #my2cents
